TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartVerbsEventHandler(object sender, WebPartVerbsEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartVerbsEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartVerbsEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartVerbsEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartVerbsEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartVerbsEventArgs ^ e);
type WebPartVerbsEventHandler = delegate of obj * WebPartVerbsEventArgs -> unit

span.span: Represents the delegate for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于指定调用的方法以响应事件都发生在从派生的区域创建的 Web 部件谓词时类。The class is used to specify the methods that are invoked in response to a event, which occurs when the Web Parts verbs are created for a zone that derives from the class. Web 部件谓词表示用户可以在 Web 部件页，例如最小化、 关闭或还原的控件; 的用户界面 (UI) 中执行的操作将控件添加到页;或取消操作。Web Parts verbs represent actions that users can perform in the user interface (UI) of a Web Parts page, such as minimizing, closing, or restoring controls; adding controls to a page; or canceling an action. 谓词可以出现在页眉和页脚区域的区域，并且没有提供的 Web 部件控件集，标准谓词和开发人员可以添加的自定义谓词。Verbs can appear in both the header and footer areas of a zone, and there are both standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set, and custom verbs that can be added by developers. 在 UI 中由可单击对象，您可以设置显示为超链接、 图像或按钮，通过使用该对象表示谓词属性。A verb is represented in the UI by a clickable object, which you can set to appear as a hyperlink, an image, or a button, by using the property. 一个区域提供一组标准的 Web 部件控件的谓词菜单中的呈现的谓词。A zone provides a standard set of verbs that get rendered in a Web Parts control's verbs menu. 自定义 Web 部件区域或 Web 部件控件在 Web 部件区域，可以向菜单添加其他谓词。A custom Web Parts zone, or a Web Parts control inside a Web Parts zone, can add additional verbs to the menu. Web 部件区域中的控件可以将谓词添加到控件的谓词菜单通过继承自基类的重写属性。A control in a Web Parts zone can add verbs to the control's verbs menu by inheriting from the base class and overriding the property. 如果控件不继承基类，可以通过实现添加一个新动词接口，并且并重写集合。If the control does not inherit from the base class, you can add a new verb by implementing the interface, and then overriding the collection. 受保护方法允许派生的类重写的事件，而无需将委托附加到它。The protected method allows derived classes to override the event without attaching a delegate to it. 在派生的类必须始终调用基类以确保注册的委托接收事件的方法。A derived class must always call the method of the base class to ensure that registered delegates receive the event.
